title: Vicious Fae
description: This is an alternate cover edition for ASIN B082GFQ36NElise continues her hunt for the King who killed her brother while trying not to fall for the vicious boys she suspects.As her investigation deepens, she seems to be closing in on some answers. And with a surprise trip to Zodiac Academy, she finds more there than she expects...This is the third installment of Ruthless Boys of the Zodiac.
author: Caroline Peckham
